scene_description_enriched: A male figure, likely a king or saint, stands in armor and a blue cloak, wearing a hat. He holds a sword in his right hand and a scepter in his left. He stands over a lion, which lies at his feet. The scene is set within an architectural space with blue walls and windows with tracery. A red and gold patterned tapestry hangs behind the figure. The overall composition is framed by an ornamental border.
